title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 28, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 28, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Lowcode
items.content_text:
### Visual programming

*   [Dynaboard](https://dynaboard.com) - Build production-ready low-code web apps in 60 seconds using AI.
*   [Potion](https://www.potion.so/) - Create custom websites in minutes. All on [Notion](https://www.notion.so/).
*   [Shuffle](https://shuffle.dev/) - Create templates in minutes.
items.content_html:
Visual programming

  • Dynaboard - Build production-ready low-code web apps in 60 seconds using AI.
  • Potion - Create custom websites in minutes. All on Notion.
  • Shuffle - Create templates in minutes.

items.title: Awesome Stock Resources
items.content_text:
### Photography / CC0-license

*   [Openverse](https://openverse.org) - A meta search across several libraries to find adaptable / editable images and audio files.
items.content_html:
Photography / CC0-license

  • Openverse - A meta search across several libraries to find adaptable / editable images and audio files.

items.title: Awesome Java
items.content_text:
### Code Generators / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [Avaje Http Server](https://avaje.io/http/) - Generates Lightweight JAX-RS style http servers using Javalin or Helidon (Nima) SE.

### Configuration / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [avaje config](https://avaje.io/config/) - Loads yaml and properties files, supports dynamic configuration, plugins, file-watching and config event listeners.

### Database / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [OpenDJ (‚≠ê406)](https://github.com/OpenIdentityPlatform/OpenDJ) - LDAPv3 compliant directory service, developed for the Java platform, providing a high performance, highly available, and secure store for the identities.

### Dependency Injection / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [Avaje Inject](https://avaje.io/inject/) - Microservice-focused compile-time injection framework without reflection.

### Distributed Applications / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [OpenIG (‚≠ê81)](https://github.com/OpenIdentityPlatform/OpenIG) - High-performance reverse proxy server with specialized session management and credential replay functionality.

### JSON / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [Avaje Jsonb](https://avaje.io/jsonb/) - Reflection-free Json binding via source code generation with Jackson-like annotations.

### Security / Other

*   [OpenAM (‚≠ê833)](https://github.com/OpenIdentityPlatform/OpenAM) - Access management solution that includes authentication, SSO, authorization, federation, entitlements and web services security.
items.content_html:
Code Generators / Text-Based User Interfaces

  • Avaje Http Server - Generates Lightweight JAX-RS style http servers using Javalin or Helidon (Nima) SE.

Configuration / Text-Based User Interfaces

  • avaje config - Loads yaml and properties files, supports dynamic configuration, plugins, file-watching and config event listeners.

Database / Text-Based User Interfaces

  • OpenDJ (‚≠ê406) - LDAPv3 compliant directory service, developed for the Java platform, providing a high performance, highly available, and secure store for the identities.

Dependency Injection / Text-Based User Interfaces

  • Avaje Inject - Microservice-focused compile-time injection framework without reflection.

Distributed Applications / Text-Based User Interfaces

  • OpenIG (‚≠ê81) - High-performance reverse proxy server with specialized session management and credential replay functionality.

JSON / Text-Based User Interfaces

  • Avaje Jsonb - Reflection-free Json binding via source code generation with Jackson-like annotations.

Security / Other

  • OpenAM (‚≠ê833) - Access management solution that includes authentication, SSO, authorization, federation, entitlements and web services security.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Markdown and LaTeX / Diagnostics

*   [Zeioth/markmap.nvim (‚≠ê197)](https://github.com/Zeioth/markmap.nvim) - Visualize your Markdown as mindmaps.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [malbertzard/inline-fold.nvim (‚≠ê86)](https://github.com/malbertzard/inline-fold.nvim) - Hide certain elements inline like long CSS classes or `href` content.
*   [chrisgrieser/nvim-origami (‚≠ê298)](https://github.com/chrisgrieser/nvim-origami) - Fold with relentless elegance.

### Code Runner / Diagnostics

*   [Zeioth/compiler.nvim (‚≠ê602)](https://github.com/Zeioth/compiler.nvim) - Compiler for building and running your code without having to configure anything.

### Preconfigured Configuration / Diagnostics

*   [NormalNvim/NormalNvim (‚≠ê638)](https://github.com/NormalNvim/NormalNvim) - Focused on stability for your daily work. From the creator of Compiler.nvim.
items.content_html:
Markdown and LaTeX / Diagnostics

  • Zeioth/markmap.nvim (‚≠ê197) - Visualize your Markdown as mindmaps.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • malbertzard/inline-fold.nvim (‚≠ê86) - Hide certain elements inline like long CSS classes or href content.
  • chrisgrieser/nvim-origami (‚≠ê298) - Fold with relentless elegance.

Code Runner / Diagnostics

  • Zeioth/compiler.nvim (‚≠ê602) - Compiler for building and running your code without having to configure anything.

Preconfigured Configuration / Diagnostics

  • NormalNvim/NormalNvim (‚≠ê638) - Focused on stability for your daily work. From the creator of Compiler.nvim.

items.title: Awesome Open Hardware
items.content_text:
### Projects

*   [Opulo](https://docs.opulo.io/) - Project that develops a pick and place machine.
*   [FarmBot](https://farm.bot/pages/open-source) - automated gardening machine to grow vegetables.

### Books

*   [Free to Make](https://books.google.nl/books?id=jz1bCwAAQBAJ\&lpg=PA93\&dq=open%20source%20hardware\&pg=PP1##v=onepage\&q=open%20source%20hardware\&f=false) -  Book by Dale Dougherty, how the maker movement is changing our schools, our jobs, and our minds.
items.content_html:
Projects

  • Opulo - Project that develops a pick and place machine.
  • FarmBot - automated gardening machine to grow vegetables.

Books

  • Free to Make - Book by Dale Dougherty, how the maker movement is changing our schools, our jobs, and our minds.

### MIDI Tools & Libraries

    generator, designed for polyrhythmic parts

MIDI Tools & Libraries

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [vue-popper-lite (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/jambonn/vue-popper-lite) - A popover component based on [popper.js tree shaking](https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/#popper-lite-tree-shaking) for Vue 3 written by TypeScript.
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / UI Components

  • vue-popper-lite (‚≠ê4) - A popover component based on popper.js tree shaking for Vue 3 written by TypeScript.

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Community Modules / Miscellaneous

*   [terraform-aws-lambda (‚≠ê995)](https://github.com/terraform-aws-modules/terraform-aws-lambda) - Terraform module, which builds dependencies and packages, and also creates AWS Lambda resources in countless combinations.
*   [terraform-aws-rds (‚≠ê937)](https://github.com/terraform-aws-modules/terraform-aws-rds) - Creates RDS resources on AWS (verified module).
*   [terraform-aws-s3-bucket (‚≠ê557)](https://github.com/terraform-aws-modules/terraform-aws-s3-bucket) - Creates S3 bucket resources on AWS.

### Providers / Vendor supported providers

*   [terraform-provider-iterative (‚≠ê295)](https://github.com/iterative/terraform-provider-iterative) - Terraform plugin built with machine learning in mind.

### Testing / Community providers

*   [terraform-compliance (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/terraform-compliance/cli) - BDD Testing for Terraform Files.

### Tools / Community providers

*   [atmos (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/cloudposse/atmos) - A universal tool that converts deep merged YAML to module inputs. :alien:
*   [k2tf (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/sl1pm4t/k2tf) - Kubernetes YAML to Terraform HCL converter.
*   [KICS (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/Checkmarx/kics) - Scans IaC projects for security vulnerabilities, compliance issues, and infrastructure misconfiguration. Currently working with Terraform projects, Kubernetes manifests, Dockerfiles, AWS CloudFormation Templates, and Ansible playbooks.
*   [pike (‚≠ê730)](https://github.com/jamesWoolfenden/pike) - Pike calculates the permissions or IAM policy required to build your Terraform.
*   [python-terrafile (‚≠ê38)](https://github.com/claranet/python-terrafile) - Systematically manage external modules from Github for use in Terraform.
*   [terraform-iam-policy-validator (‚≠ê338)](https://github.com/awslabs/terraform-iam-policy-validator) - CLI validates AWS IAM Policies in a Terraform template against AWS IAM best practices.
*   [Terraform-Visual (‚≠ê639)](https://github.com/hieven/terraform-visual) - A simple but powerful tool to visualize Terraform plan.
*   [terragrunt (‚≠ê8.8k)](https://github.com/gruntwork-io/terragrunt) - Terragrunt is a thin wrapper for Terraform that provides extra tools for keeping your Terraform configurations DRY, working with multiple Terraform modules, and managing remote state.
*   [tfmake (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/tfmake/tfmake) - Automating Terraform with the power of make.
*   [tfsec (‚≠ê6.9k)](https://github.com/aquasecurity/tfsec) - Terraform static analysis tool that supports terraform <0.12 & >=0.12 & directly integrates with HCL parser for better results.
*   [tfvaultenv (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/oulman/tfvaultenv) - tfvaultenv reads secrets from HashiCorp Vault and outputs environment variables for various Terraform providers with those secrets.

### Libraries / IDE

*   [nu\_plugin\_hcl (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/Yethal/nu_plugin_hcl) - HCL parser plugin for [Nushell (‚≠ê36k)](https://github.com/nushell/nushell)
items.content_html:
Community Modules / Miscellaneous

  • terraform-aws-lambda (‚≠ê995) - Terraform module, which builds dependencies and packages, and also creates AWS Lambda resources in countless combinations.
  • terraform-aws-rds (‚≠ê937) - Creates RDS resources on AWS (verified module).
  • terraform-aws-s3-bucket (‚≠ê557) - Creates S3 bucket resources on AWS.

Providers / Vendor supported providers

  • terraform-provider-iterative (‚≠ê295) - Terraform plugin built with machine learning in mind.

Testing / Community providers

  • terraform-compliance (‚≠ê1.4k) - BDD Testing for Terraform Files.

Tools / Community providers

  • atmos (‚≠ê1.1k) - A universal tool that converts deep merged YAML to module inputs. üëΩ
  • k2tf (‚≠ê1.2k) - Kubernetes YAML to Terraform HCL converter.
  • KICS (‚≠ê2.4k) - Scans IaC projects for security vulnerabilities, compliance issues, and infrastructure misconfiguration. Currently working with Terraform projects, Kubernetes manifests, Dockerfiles, AWS CloudFormation Templates, and Ansible playbooks.
  • pike (‚≠ê730) - Pike calculates the permissions or IAM policy required to build your Terraform.
  • python-terrafile (‚≠ê38) - Systematically manage external modules from Github for use in Terraform.
  • terraform-iam-policy-validator (‚≠ê338) - CLI validates AWS IAM Policies in a Terraform template against AWS IAM best practices.
  • Terraform-Visual (‚≠ê639) - A simple but powerful tool to visualize Terraform plan.
  • terragrunt (‚≠ê8.8k) - Terragrunt is a thin wrapper for Terraform that provides extra tools for keeping your Terraform configurations DRY, working with multiple Terraform modules, and managing remote state.
  • tfmake (‚≠ê26) - Automating Terraform with the power of make.
  • tfsec (‚≠ê6.9k) - Terraform static analysis tool that supports terraform <0.12 & >=0.12 & directly integrates with HCL parser for better results.
  • tfvaultenv (‚≠ê47) - tfvaultenv reads secrets from HashiCorp Vault and outputs environment variables for various Terraform providers with those secrets.

Libraries / IDE

  • nu_plugin_hcl (‚≠ê8) - HCL parser plugin for Nushell (‚≠ê36k)
